DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA NORMAL VOLUNTEERS : Participant must volunteer ocular , visual , oculomotor problem . Participant must 18 year old old . Participant must able follow direction actively pay attention visual stimuli respond appropriate . For study use contact lens , participant must able tolerate contact lens either one eye .
